pkgmetadata.longdescription: # genheader## Introduction![showcase](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83401142/144825570-210f51ed-ddfc-4a14-b84a-10db1aac8563.gif)Injects c function prototypes(BSD-style) into header.## Usage`genheader [-h] -I header.h [dir/ ... file.c]`You need to have a .h file with- A line comment containing: `@functions` or `@func`- End with `#endif` or `@end`### examples```c#ifndef HEAD_H# define HEAD_H//===== @functions =====#endif``````c//@func//@end```
